Top ten markets versus main last departure airports and 
main airlines to Sri Lanka  
June 2022 
The below tables depict the main last departure airports and airlines analyzed by top markets 
to Sri Lanka. Sri Lankan Airlines and Spice Jet  are the most popular airlines for Indians. Fly 
Dubai has become the most popular airline among tourists from Russia in the absence of the 
Aeroflot which ceased operations after 2nd June.  For majority of travellers from France and 
Spain, Qatar Airways is the most preferable airline and Doha is the main last departure airport. 
The  figures  further  indicates  that  for  tourists  from  Australia,  Maldives  and  Germany,  Sri
